definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
to fight corruption and advocate probity

sentences.english: New progress has been made in improving Party conduct, promoting integrity and combating corruption.
sentences.chinese: 黨風廉政建設和反腐敗鬥爭取得新成效。

sentences.english: But his anti-corruption law and an ethics task-force did not go far enough.
sentences.chinese: 但是他的反腐敗法和道德工作推動力遠遠還不夠。

sentences.english: We will strengthen our efforts to promote clean government and combat corruption.
sentences.chinese: 加強廉政建設和反腐敗工作。

sentences.english: However, the support and motivation of incorruption system by the incorruption culture can not be underestimated.
sentences.chinese: 但是，廉政文化對制度反腐的支持和推動力不容小覷。

sentences.english: Anti-corruption campaign is a major political issue in China, even in the world.
sentences.chinese: 反腐倡廉是中國乃至世界的一項重大政治課題。

sentences.english: The first part discusses the reason why the anti-corruption novel rises and grows prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分論述反腐小說興起和繁盛的原因。

sentences.english: Anti-corruption focus on building a scientific system and anti-corruption system.
sentences.chinese: 反腐重點在於構建科學的制度反腐體系。

sentences.english: Anti-corruption focus on building a scientific system and anti-corruption system.
sentences.chinese: 反腐重點在於構建科學的制度反腐體系。

sentences.english: Singh said, only parliament can decide now what kind of anti-corruption bill India will have.
sentences.chinese: 辛格說，只有議會才能決定印度實行什麼反腐法案。

sentences.english: China launches probe into alleged graft at telcos.
sentences.chinese: 政府發起對電信運營商高管的反腐調查。

sentences.english: At present, there exists problem in executive power.
sentences.chinese: 目前高校在反腐倡廉制度執行力上還存在問題。

sentences.english: It gives us much for thought for today's anti-corruption work.
sentences.chinese: 對今天的反腐倡廉工作有所啓迪。

sentences.english: The agency also supports efforts to fight trafficking in persons and corruption.
sentences.chinese: 該署還支持打擊人口販運及反腐敗的工作。

sentences.english: We will make investigating and prosecuting major violations of the law and discipline an important task in the ?ght against corruption.
sentences.chinese: 要把查處違法違紀大案要案，作爲反腐敗的重要任務。

sentences.english: Should be given to the anti-corruption Department decisive right of disposal, the first free check.
sentences.chinese: 應賦予反腐部門果斷處置權，先免再查。

sentences.english: Hundreds of governance and anti-corruption activities take place throughout the World Bank.
sentences.chinese: 世行開展了大量治理和反腐敗工作。

definition: to fight corruption and advocate probity
Central Commission for Discipline Inspection (CCDI), organization within the CCP which investigates corruption and other wrongdoing among Party cadres/abbr. for 中共中央紀律檢查委員會|中共中央纪律检查委员会
Zhou Yongkang (1942-), PRC petroleum engineer and politician
